title: QoL Change: Please stop Krug buff being wasted on dead jungle creeps.
body:
Jungle main here,

This has annoyed me for ages. The Krug buff will activate even if that auto-attack would kill the jungle creep. This means you're not achieving optimal damage negation from it.

In some cases if you're paying careful attention you can juggle your autos between creeps to not waste the buff. But if it's the last creep in the camp, you don't have a choice, you have to use it and walk off to the next camp with the buff counter reset to zero.

Surely they could do a small QoL change here to help us Junglers out. Damage negation is so important, especially if you're playing someone with less than stellar sustain.

There's even a kind of precedent for this change. I remember when Lucian first came out they changed his passive so that the second auto wouldn't be wasted on an already dead creep, there has to be a way to detect and change this.
